title: One injured in Spenard shooting
content:
One person was hospitalized after a shooting in the Anchorage neighborhood of Spenard Saturday evening, police say.
The Anchorage Police Department responded to the 2500 block of Kona Lane around 6:10 p.m., according to an APD release. One adult suffered a single gunshot wound and was taken to a hospital, where he was in surgery, the release said.
Police said Saturday night they didn't know the severity of the injury and wouldn't provide further details until Sunday as their investigation moves forward.
